steps.step: Check if .env file exists in project root
Verify OPENAI_API_KEY format is correct (no quotes needed)
Ensure python-dotenv is installed
Try setting key directly in environment: export OPENAI_API_KEY=your-key
Activate virtual environment if using one
Run: pip install -r requirements.txt
Verify installations: pip list | grep -E "gradio|openai|requests"
Check Python version compatibility (3.8+)
Check if another Gradio app is running: netstat -ano | findstr :7860
Kill process if needed: taskkill /PID process_id /F
Or specify different port: interface.launch(server_port=7861)
Verify Ollama is running: curl http://localhost:11434/api/version
Check available models: ollama list
Pull required model: ollama pull llama3.2
Check logs for specific error messages in logs/app.log
Check provider selection matches model format
Verify model exists in provider's available models
Clear browser cache if UI shows outdated models
Check logs for model loading errors
